# dobby-storage

https://github.com/Ting-Yu/dobby-storage.git

## S3 Information

- CUSTOM_AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
- CUSTOM_AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
- CUSTOM_AWS_DEFAULT_REGION
- CUSTOM_AWS_BUCKET
-

## FTP Information

- CUSTOM_FTP_SERVER
- CUSTOM_FTP_USER
- CUSTOM_FTP_PASSWORD
-

## Google Drive Information

- CUSTOM_GOOGLE_DRIVE_AUTH_PATH


## Install Module

```bash
pip install dobby-storage
```

## Unit Test
    
```bash
pytest
```
